title: what did Kai'sa eat while being stuck in the void for years?
body:
I reread the lore and it said she found some meager foodstuffs from other ppl who got trapped

but she was trapped there for years

wtf did she eat to survive and is there water and shelter in the void? 

https://pre00.deviantart.net/9ab2/th/pre/f/2018/099/d/e/league_of_legends__kai_sa_by_markou000-dc8cno5.jpg
